text: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ سِرَّهُمۡ وَنَجۡوَىٰهُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَّـٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ

translation.en: Did they not know that Allah knows their secrets and their private conversations and that Allah is the Knower of the unseen
translation.id: Tidakkah mereka mengetahui bahwa Allah mengetahui rahasia dan bisikan mereka, dan bahwa Allah mengetahui segala yang gaib
